sn16.4:1.3: kathamrupo bhikkhu arahati kulupako hotum, kathamrupo bhikkhu na arahati kulupako hotun”ti?
sn16.4:2.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evamcitto kulani upasankamati:
sn16.4:2.7: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evamcittassa kulani upasankamato na denti, tena bhikkhu sandiyati; so tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:2.10: dandham denti, no sigham, tena bhikkhu sandiyati; so tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:2.11: Asakkaccam denti, no sakkaccam; tena bhikkhu sandiyati; so tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:2.12: Evarupo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na arahati kulupako hotum.
sn16.4:3.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evamcitto kulani upasankamati:
sn16.4:3.8: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evamcittassa kulani upasankamato na denti; tena bhikkhu na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:3.9: Thokam denti, no bahukam; tena bhikkhu na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:3.10: Lukham denti, no panitam; tena bhikkhu na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:3.11: Dandham denti, no sigham; tena bhikkhu na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:3.12: Asakkaccam denti, no sakkaccam; tena bhikkhu na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:3.13: Evarupo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kulupako hotum.
sn16.4:4.8: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kassapassa evamcittassa kulani upasankamato na denti; tena kassapo na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:4.9: Thokam denti, no bahukam; tena kassapo na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:4.10: Lukham denti, no panitam; tena kassapo na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:4.11: Dandham denti, no sigham; tena kassapo na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:4.12: Asakkaccam denti, no sakkaccam; tena kassapo na sandiyati; so na tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn16.4:4.13: Kassapena va hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissami yo va panassa kassapasadiso. Ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattaya patipajjitabban”ti.
